abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32249952, pmid32251688, pmid32249956, pmid32251619, pmid32249918, pmid32251568, pmid32250388, pmid32249943, pmid32251638, pmid32249944, pmid32250394, pmid32250385, pmid32251639, pmid32251637
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.04.07
